title: John's Todo App Solution
body: Implemented CRUD operations with React hooks and localStorage. Includes Jest tests for all components.

title: Jane's Todo App
body: Used useContext for state management. Added dark mode toggle feature.

title: Alice's Blog API
body: Implemented JWT authentication. Swagger docs included at /api-docs.

title: Bob's LED Blink Code
body: Used GPIO pin 13. Demo video link: https://example.com/demo1

title: Eva's Library Stories
body: Prioritized checkout/return features for Sprint 1. Attached CSV with full backlog.

title: Mike's Query Fixes
body: Added composite indexes on user_id+created_at. Reduced query time from 2s to 50ms.

title: Sarah's Serverless API
body: Deployed with Terraform. Uses DynamoDB streams for real-time updates.

title: Tom's Weather App
body: Implemented location services and 5-day forecast. Used Bloc for state management.
